I am a single, language genius who enjoys shopping and collecting memories from my travels.

I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking.
I'm doing well too. I just got back from a trip to Japan.
Oh, that sounds exciting! How was it?
It was amazing! I loved the food and the culture.
I'm glad you enjoyed it. I've always wanted to go to Japan.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful country.
I will have to put it on my bucket list.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to explore new places, shop, and collect memories from my travels.
Those sound like fun hobbies. I like to do similar things.
That's great! We should go on a trip together sometime.
That would be fun. I'd love to explore the world with you.
